entry.title: Writing your own Kubernetes operator and CRD in Python
entry.summary:
Description

This talk was presented at PyCon India 2021 Online.

PyCon India is the largest gathering of Pythonistas in India for the Python programming language. The 13th edition of PyCon India took place online from 17th Sept to 20th Sept 2021.

Talk Detail: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/2021/proposals â€¦
entry.content:
Description

This talk was presented at PyCon India 2021 Online.

PyCon India is the largest gathering of Pythonistas in India for the Python programming language. The 13th edition of PyCon India took place online from 17th Sept to 20th Sept 2021.

Talk Detail: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/2021/proposals/writing-your-own-kubernetes-operator-and-crd-in-python-with-kopf-to-enhance-and-harden-your-kubernetes-clusters~azpvm/

Click here to subscribe to the PyCon India channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/inpycon?sub_confirmation=1 Follow PyCon India on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconindia Follow PyCon India on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PyConIndia/

entry.title: Writing your own Kubernetes operator and CRD in Python with kopf to enhance and harden your Kubernetes clusters
entry.content:
Description

Writing your own Kubernetes operator and CRD in Python with kopf to enhance and harden your Kubernetes clusters
